resources.string: An empty scene. Not much to do here.
A scene with some shapes. Move the mouse over the shapes.
A scene with a character, with orientation and different states. Press the buttons to control the character.
A scene with a character moving and talking. Press anywhere in the scene to move the character there. Press on the character to make him talk.

"Hello, my friend. I have a loooooooooooooooooooooooooooooot of things to say. Will I be able to tell all in one only bubble? Yeah, I didn't think so. So let's move on to the next topic, shall we?Hello, my friend. I have a loooooooooooooooooooooooooooooot of things to say. Will I be able to tell all in one only bubble? Yeah, I didn't think so. A scene a show complex elements with some animaitons.
A scene to test show question effect.
A scene where a sound is played
A scene showing some drawables of eAdventure
A scene to tests corners in EAdPosition
A scene scrolling with the character
A scene in which elements share effects
A scene showing a YouTube video.
A scene showing some filters over elements.
A scene showing drag and drop
